You do not need anything install on your computer to take part in this workshop. 

There are some interactive sections which can completed in binder. 

<a href="https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/StatsRhian/demo-quarto-for-managers/main?urlpath=rstudio" target="_blank">
    <img src="http://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg" alt="Launch RStudio Binder">
</a>

You may need to wait a few moments for it to load. There are two exercise folders with quarto files for you to try editing and rendering.

 Thanks to [the Binder project](https://mybinder.org/) and [{holepunch} package](https://github.com/karthik/holepunch). My set-up files for binder are [on GitHub](https://github.com/StatsRhian/demo-quarto-for-managers).
